Balcom Eastates Conservation Land

Parking

Senior Center, Groton MA
Google Maps, Apple Maps

Hill Road, Groton MA
Google Maps, Apple Maps

Hours

Half an hour past sunrise to half an hour past sunset. Sunrise Time , Sunset Time

Size

1.4 Acres, Trails 0.2 miles, 0.3 km

Property Owner

Groton Conservation Commission

Links

Official Conservation Commission Page
Groton Herald, Fitch's Bridge

Trail Maintenance

Volunteers and the Groton Trails Committee. Please email gtc@grotontrails.org to report problems or volunteer.

Description

This property is part of the trail network that follows the abandoned Brookline and Pepperell railroad. The trail network connects the Squannacook River to Fitch's Bridge. Park at the Senior Center, walk north, follow Spencer Circle, then pick up the trail at the intersection of Spencer Circle and Hill Road to Fitch's Bridge. Please avoid the trails to the east since they are private property.
